topic.title: Extended Attributes
topic.shortdesc: Couchbase Server permits the definition of extended attributes on individual documents. These are JSON key-value pairs, containing meta-data; which can optionally be made accessible only by selected users. The SDK supports extended attributes through extensions to the Subdocument API: this allows extended attributes to be defined, searched for, edited, removed, and more.

section.title: Language-Specific Variations
section.p: Each language supported by the Couchbase SDK implements extended-attribute support in a slightly different way. For Java examples, see Sample Code.
For detailed information on the Subdocument API, see Subdocument Operations.
